EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners Contact (1348092073.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners Contact (1348092073.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Patrick, I am sorry you did not find the new site helpful. I have attached a guide to the TN via process at MBO Partners. In addition, I have answered your questions below in blue. Please let me know if you would like to move forward with MBO. Thanks!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com If you are in the DC area please check out our upcoming networking event! Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. -----Original Message----- From: Patrick Shea [mailto:shpa@ps1.net] Sent: Wednesday, September 19, 2012 3:35 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners Contact I just have a few questions, I did work with MBO in the past but it's been a while and your new web site it not very helpful in finding answers... So here's my situation: I'm a Canadian citizen living in Canada doing contract work in the US, usually as a W2 or full time employee. This time I'm looking to go corp-to-corp and thought of using MBO again so here are my questions. 1. Can I use MBO event though I'm not a US "resident" (but paying US taxes)? Yes.2. Does MBO covers GL insurances (used to I think)? Yes. 3. Last time I got a TN letter (NAFTA) from MBO, is this still okay? Yes. Here is an example. <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/TN_Letter_Template.doc>4. What are the fees? There is an additional 1% (for administrative costs) added to our standard 5% service fee (6% total) and there are fees associated with processing the TN Visa, please see attached. Thanks!SaraThanksPatrick -----Original Message-----From: "Sara Conde" <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>>Sent: Wednesday, September 19, 2012 12:22pmTo: "shpa@ps1.net <mailto:shpa@ps1.net>" <shpa@ps1.net <mailto:shpa@ps1.net>>Subject: MBO Partners Contact Dear Patrick , Thank you for the inquiry you submitted at the MBO Partners website. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I'll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. You may easily book a time that is convenient for you on my online schedule by going here<http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFlJtGdm%2BK3XLKz59V%2BqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFlJtGdm%2BK3XLKz59V%2BqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>>. You can also watch a short video about who we are on You Tube<http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFlJtGdm%2BK3XLKz59V%2BqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://youtu.be/zKDzwSTmGv4?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFlJtGdm%2BK3XLKz59V%2BqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>>. I look forward to speaking with you and sharing more information about MBO Partners! Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com<http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFlJtGdm%2BK3XLKz59V%2BqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com%3chttp://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFlJtGdm%2BK3XLKz59V%2BqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>>w: www.mbopartners.com<http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFlJtGdm%2BK3XLKz59V%2BqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D <http://www.mbopartners.com%3chttp:/mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCaFlJtGdm%2BK3XLKz59V%2BqEPLC0dYXY52MuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
